snippet: The show of support by the United States comes two weeks after the Saudi military launched an air war against the Houthi rebel movement in Yemen.
abstract: United States says it is expediting deliveries of weapons to Saudi Arabia, signaling Obama administration's increased involvement in Saudi battle against Houthi fighters in Yemen.

byline.original: By KAREEM FAHIM and NICK CUMMING-BRUCE
byline.contributor: Kareem Fahim reported from Cairo, and Nick Cumming-Bruce from Geneva. Rick Gladstone contributed reporting from New York.

lead_paragraph: The show of support by the United States comes two weeks after the Saudi military launched an air war against the Houthi rebel movement in Yemen.

headline.main: Expedited Weapons Deliveries to Saudi Arabia Signal Deepening U.S. Involvement
headline.print_headline: Expedited Weapons Deliveries to Saudi Arabia Signal Deepening U.S. Involvement
